ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Good Friday
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: It’s a mir-e-cle!
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Ascension Thursday
ns1:PAGE.ns1:COMMENT: Ascension Day is 40 days after Easter

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Ascension Sunday
ns1:PAGE.ns1:COMMENT: Ascension Day is 40 days after Easter

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Ash Wednesday
ns1:PAGE.ns1:COMMENT: Ash Wednesday is 46 day before Easter

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Shrove Tuesday
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Attention, attention! Lucky, lucky! For the next ten minutes, everything comes with pancakes.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Laverne DeFazio
ns1:PAGE.ns1:COMMENT: Shrove Tuesday is 47 days before Easter

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Easter
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Peeps be with you.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: MoMam

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Martin Luther King Day
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: I have a dream that one day this nation will rise up and live out the true meaning of its creed: We hold these truths to be self-evident: that all men are created equal. I have a dream that one day on the red hills of Georgia the sons of former slaves and the sons of former slave owners will be able to sit down together at a table of brotherhood.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Martin Luther King
ns1:PAGE.ns1:COMMENT: Martin Luthor King Day is third Monday of January

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Inauguration Day
ns1:PAGE.ns1:COMMENT: Every 4 years after a national election

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Chinese New Year. Year of the Fire Chicken.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: You will have a prosperous year … in bed.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Chinese Proverb

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Chinese New Year. Year of the Earth Dog.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: You will have a prosperous year … in bed.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Chinese Proverb

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Chinese New Year. Year of the Earth Pig.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: You will have a prosperous year … in bed.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Chinese Proverb

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Chinese New Year. Year of the Metal Rat.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: You will have a prosperous year … in bed.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Chinese Proverb

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Chinese New Year. Year of the Metal Ox.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Those Hamm/Flemmings can turn a phrase.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Elizabeth Donovan

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Super Bowl Sunday
ns1:PAGE.ns1:COMMENT: Super Bowl is first Sunday in February

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: President's Day
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: The pay is good and I can walk to work.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: John F. Kennedy
ns1:PAGE.ns1:COMMENT: President's Day is third Monday of February (can occur Feb 15 - 21 inclusive)

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Daylight Savings Time Begins (Turn clock forward an hour)
Tax Day
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Pay the price.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Memorial Day
ns1:PAGE.ns1:COMMENT: Last Monday in May

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Military Spouses Day
ns1:PAGE.ns1:COMMENT: Military spouses day is two days before Mother's Day

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Mother's Day
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Muth-ah!
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny
ns1:PAGE.ns1:COMMENT: Mother's Day: Second Sunday in May

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Armed Forces Day
ns1:PAGE.ns1:COMMENT: Armed Forces Day is the third Sunday in May

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Father's Day
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: You are a sad, strange little man, and you have my pity.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Buzz Lightyear from the movie Toy Story

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Parents Day
ns1:PAGE.ns1:COMMENT: Parent's Day is the fourth Sunday in July

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Sisters Day
ns1:PAGE.ns1:COMMENT: Sister's day is the first Sunday in August

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: International Bacon Day (not to be confused with National Bacon Day)
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Bippity boppity bacon!
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Jim Gaffigan

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Columbus Day
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Are we there yet?
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Everyone
ns1:PAGE.ns1:COMMENT: Columbus Day is second Monday in October

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Daylight Savings Time Ends (turn clock back an hour)
ns1:PAGE.ns1:COMMENT: Daylight savings ends first Sunday in November

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Men Make Dinner Day
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: THAT just happened!
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Ricky Bobby from the movie Talledega Nights
ns1:PAGE.ns1:COMMENT: Men Make Dinner Day is the first Thursday in November

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Thanksgiving
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Gobble, gobble, gobble, fat turkeys, fat turkeys. Gobble, gobble, gobble, fat turkeys are we. We're not here for living, we're here for Thanksgiving. Gobble, gobble, gobble, fat turkeys are we.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Johnny Burke
ns1:PAGE.ns1:COMMENT: Fourth Thursday in November

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Black Friday
ns1:PAGE.ns1:COMMENT: Fourth Friday in November (day after Thanksgiving)

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: New Year’s Day
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Those Hamm/Flemmings can turn a phrase.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Elizabeth Donovan

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Fasten your seatbelts. It's going to be a bumpy night.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Bette Davis

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Festival of Sleep Day
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: It's just the shank of the evening.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Vicki
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: What a girl!
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Angela
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: What a girl!
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: There's no place like home.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Dorothy Gale from the movie The Wizard of Oz

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Epiphany Begins
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Youse is welcome, Perry.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: It's proud I am.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: I’m going to thrash you!
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Mercy!
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Flemming Family Frase

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Don’t forget to bring in your brass monkey.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: You have a little Don Ho on you.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Barry

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Brrrry brr!
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Epiphany Ends
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: I'm Sainted and Tainted!
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Elizabeth
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Let's put on a show!
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Sir

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Put the arm on me for…
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: National Religious Freedom Day
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Religion is like a pair of shoes.....Find one that fits for you, but don't make me wear your shoes.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: George Carlin

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Oh, that's fit for a king. Here King!
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: More's the pity.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: I miss it like a toothache.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Penguin Awareness Day
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: I can see Russia from my house.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Tina Fey as Sarah Palin

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Barry
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Francisco! That's fun to say! Francisco... Frannncisco... Franciscooo…
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Buddy the Elf and Max

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Max
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Francisco! That's fun to say! Francisco... Frannncisco... Franciscooo…
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Buddy the Elf and Max

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: The writing's on the wall.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: That’s my story and I’m sticking with it.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Oh kids, this is going to be such an adventure.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Always wave at every helicopter you see.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Barry

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Where are you at? Just before the at?
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: You are so dumb. You are really dumb -- for real.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Antoine Dodson

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Data Privacy Day
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Privacy is not something that I'm merely entitled to, it's an absolute prerequisite.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Marlon Brando

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: You look fine.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Sir

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Mam
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Ju-dath!
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: This is one time where television really fails to capture the true excitement of a large squirrel predicting the weather.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Phil from the movie Groundhog Day

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: National Freedom Day
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Oh, sweetheart, you don't need law school. Law school is for people who are boring and ugly and serious. And you, button, are none of those things.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Elle Wood's Father from the movie Legally Blonde

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Groundhog Day
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Phil: What would you do if you were stuck in one place and every day was exactly the same, and nothing that you did mattered? Ralph: That about sums it up for me.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Phil and Ralph from the movie Groundhog Day

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: They say I have ADD but they just don't understand. Oh, look, a chicken!
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Barry

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: You drive like Pu-Ling.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: I wouldn’t be a bit surprised.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Go wash your hands and face and don’t touch a thing on the way.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: A little song. A little dance. A little seltzer down your pants.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Chuckles the Clown from The Mary Tyler Moore Show

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Would you please put on some pants? I feel weird having to ask you twice.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Phil from the movie The Hangover

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: It's cheap, easy and close to home.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Umbrella day
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: How are you feeling? Once all over and twice if they'll let me.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: It's better than a poke in the eye with a sharp stick.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: God save the queen.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Angela

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Do you want a spotch upside the head?
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Unknown

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Valentine's Day
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Valentine's Day is so much fun, sending cards to everyone. Big red Hearts so bright and gay. I love you, I love you. That's what they say!
Oh my God, the bend and snap works every time.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Legally Blonde

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: You're sassy, classy and kickin'-assy.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: A Hallmark greeting

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: They fixed enough food to feed an army of coxes.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: War does not determine who is right, only who is left.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Bertrand Russell

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: They’d kick if they were in swimming.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: The best thing to hold onto in life, is each other.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Audrey Hepburn

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Roger. Zero-G and I feel fine. Capsule is turning around. Oh! That view is tremendous!
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: John Glenn from Friendship 7

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Be Humble day
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: How am I? Able to sit up and take a little light nourishment
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Everyone just pretend to be normal.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Richard from the movie Little Miss Sunshine

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Take your time a’going and don’t hurry back!
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Quitter's quit.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Benjamin

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: I could just eat her up with a spoon.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Heavens to Murgatroyd.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Snagglepuss

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Kate
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: You were hatched.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Kate

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Leap Day
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Just keep swimming … swimming … swimming …
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Dory from the movie Finding Nemo

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Do you remember when we spent those four amazing hours in the hot tub together? Well, this is so much better than that!
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Elle Woods from the movie Legally Blonde

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Dr Seuss
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter and those who matter don't mind.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Dr. Seuss

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: National Anthem Day
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: I'm a Caribbean Amphibian. I like to hop in the tropical … sea.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Kermit the Frog

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: “Beave!” said the mother. “We beave” said the seven…
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: You always appear more formidable to others than you think you are.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: David Zeke

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Michael
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Excuse me sir, where do you keep your nuts?
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Michael

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Consistency is the last refuge of the unimaginative.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Oscar Wilde

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: He was pretty good…for him.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Be good and if you can’t be good be careful.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: If it's not one thing, it's the other and sometimes it's both.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: I’ll just say this about that.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Bucky was plucky, but he kept right on going.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Later than I ever knowed it to be.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Pi Approximation Day
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Try not. Do… or do not. There is no try.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Yoda

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Little Bead, Patter Rogue, Dolly Hossle, Tinkle Whistle, Great Big Hobble Gobble.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: It's all about everything.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: St. Patrick's Day
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: The night that Paddy Murphy died, I never will forget. The Irish all got Stinking drunk, and some aren't sober yet. The one thing that they did that night that filled my heart with fear, they took the ice right off the corpse and put it on the beer! Oh, that's how we showed our respect for Paddy Murphy, that's how we showed our honor and our pride. Oh, baby! That's how we showed our respect to Paddy Murphy, on the night that Paddy died!

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Abby
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: The night that Paddy Murphy died, I never will forget. The Irish all got Stinking drunk, and some aren't sober yet. The one thing that they did that night that filled my heart with fear, they took the ice right off the corpse and put it on the beer! Oh, that's how we showed our respect for Paddy Murphy, that's how we showed our honor and our pride. Oh, baby! That's how we showed our respect to Paddy Murphy, on the night that Paddy died!
If they're Irish, invite them over for a drink and a fist fight.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Cathy

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Ah it's marvelous, it tis. How we look so much alike.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Chester O'Chimp

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: First day of Spring
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: What did he have to claim?
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny
ns1:PAGE.ns1:COMMENT: First day of Spring is not really fixed but it happens to be the same day for the next several years (2017 - 2020)

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Use the Force, Luke.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Obi Wan Kenobi

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: National Goof Off Day
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Monkey with a cold.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Kitties, kitties everywhere. Kitties, kitties in my hair.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: How did Abby take a picture of her eyelashes?
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Maridith

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Peas, peas, peas, eating goober peas!
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Cathy

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Where's the beef?
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Clara Peller from a Wendy's commercial

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: National "Joe" Day
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: WTF? I thought it means What The Fish!
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Emily

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: No, that’s what YOU get!
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: You ain’t a whistlin’.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: May the light always find you on a dreary day. When you need to be home, may you find your way. May you always have courage to take a chance and never find frogs in your underpants.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Irish Proverb

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Adelynn
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Biggie girl, no tiny baby.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: April Fool's Day
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: April Foo
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Maridith

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: National Peanut Butter and Jelly Day
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: My gum will be lonely down there by itself.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Vicki

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: You’ll get your reward in heaven… a bale of hay, you jackass!
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Crack kills.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Becky

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Where am I going? Crazy. Want to come?
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Vicki

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: They all died in a freak gasoline fight accident.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Derek Zoolander

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: They were a motley crew.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Have you ever killed anyone? Yeah, but they were all bad.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: the movie True Lies

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Hussy!
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: National Siblings Day
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Right, Chief!
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Sir

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Sir
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Woooooooo. Pig. Sooie! Woooooooo. Pig. Sooie! Woooooooo. Pig. Sooie! Razorbacks!
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Arkansas Hog Call

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Maridith
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Yes, Law.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Any girl can be glamorous. All you have to do is stand still and look stupid.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Hedy Lamarr

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: April hath put a spirit of youth in everything
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: William Shakespeare

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Republicans believe every day is the Forth of July, but the democrats believe every day is April 15th.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Ronald Reagan

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Elections should be held on April 16th -- the day after we pay our income taxes. That is one of the few things that might discourage politicians from being big spenders.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Thomas Sowell

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Can you hear me now?
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: I never said most of the things I said.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Yogi Berra

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: I'll be there God willing and if the creek don’t rise.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Sharkbait OO HA HA.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Bloat, Gurgle and Bubbles from the movie Finding Nemo

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: What in the Ho-Hum?
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Earth Day
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Wine is constant proof that God loves us and loves to see us happy.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Benjamin Franklin

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Holy crap on a hot cross bun!
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Cathy

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Claire
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Eat this fruit. Do you want to die of the scurvy?
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: She's a lean green tooth-eating machine.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Maxwell (about Abby)

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Live long and prosper.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Mr. Spock from Star Trek

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: He doesn’t know diddly.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Great Poetry Reading Day
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Write when you learn how.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: He doesn't have a snowball’s chance in Hell.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Can't we all just get along?
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Rodney King

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Granny and Papa
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Marry in haste, repent at leisure.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Barry and Becky
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Marry in haste, repent at leisure.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: You had me at hello.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Dorothy Boyd from the movie Jerry McGuire

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: I need that like a dose of salts.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Star Wars Day
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: May the force be with you.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Obi Wan Kenobi

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Cinco De Mayo
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: The test of one's manliness is how much spicy stuff he can eat… I am not the man I was anymore.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Barry (drunk)

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: National Nurses Day
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: My memory of you is better than you.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Lao Tzu

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: That’s neither here nor there.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: World Red Cross Day
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: You can't go wrong with the Red Cross. I know it's boring. But they're there, and they are ready."
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Trent Stamp

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: You kill your snakes and I'll kill mine.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Cathy

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: If you're not yet divorced, you're neither fish nor fowl.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: What's new in this neck of the woods?

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: God gave us our faces, but we pick our own noses.

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Remember kid, there's heroes and there's legends. Heroes get remembered but legends never die. Follow your heart kid and you'll never go wrong.

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Becky
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: It's Beauteous!
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: A child of five would understand this. Send someone to fetch a child of five.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Groucho Marx

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Pug nosed pilot pugging down the pugway.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Vicki

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: See, how it works is, the train moves, not the station!
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Ernie Capadino

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: I have ESPN.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Benjamin

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Halloween
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Trick or treat. Smell my feet. Give me something good to eat.

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: All Saints Day
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Winter is an etching, spring a watercolor, summer an oil painting and autumn a mosaic of them all.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Stanley Horowitz

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: I knew she was scrappy.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Maridith

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: You can't wait for inspiration. You have to go after it with a club.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Jack London

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: He's mean as a snake.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Fun Family
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: MoMam

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: We’re terribly lost, but making good time.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Judith and Marcus
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Doesn’t get much better than that.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: You are the bane of my existence.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Vicki and Mike
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: It’s just as easy to love a rich man as it is to love a poor man.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Mama always said life was like a box of chocolates. You never know what you're gonna get.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Forest Gump

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Veteran's Day
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Ready! Fire! Aim!
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Sir

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: I would if I could, but I can't, so I won't.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Sir

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Caregiver Appreciation Day
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: These are my childers.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: That's no moon. It's a space station.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Obi Wan Kenobi

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Laura
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: I did not have three thousand pairs of shoes, I had one thousand and sixty.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Imelda Marcos

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Jenny
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Good night, nurse.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: You like me. You really like me!
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Sally Field (misquoted)

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Ramsey residence, Maridith speaking.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Sir

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Duke put me in time out.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Abigail

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Universal Children's Day
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: That’s my story and I’m stuck with it.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: He’s mean, but he’s fair -- he’s mean to everyone.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Glinda: I've decided to make you my new project. Elphaba: You really don't have to do that. Glinda: I know. That's what makes me so nice!
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: The play Wicked

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Share what you love, Honor what you consume, Give away what you can, And embrace those who inspire you.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Katherine Cerulean

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Mike P
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Kah-Rahm-Bah!
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: You work on commission right? Big mistake. Big. HUGE!
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Vivian Ward

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: I once caught a fish T-H-I-S big.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Dave

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Hang your clothes on a hickory stick, but don’t go near the water.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: We are going to be spending an obscene amount of money in here. So we're going to need a lot more help sucking up to us, 'cause that's what we really like.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Edward Lewis from the movie Pretty Woman

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Square Dance Day
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: I must be off, but then you knew that!

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: It's fine, not to worry.

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: You kids call THAT a drunken brawl?

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: The older the berry, the sweeter the juice.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: MoMam

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Granny our Matriarch
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: She’s a biddy, but she's a tough old biddy.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: I can do that in jig time.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: There has got to be more to life than just being really, really, really ridiculously good-looking.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Derek Zoolander

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Up, Hema!
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Sir

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: I'd buy that for a dollar.

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Here's your hat; what's your hurry?
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Bazinga!

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: He's cross as a bear.

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: I'm getting the black look.

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: He's crooked as a barrel of snakes.

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: What in the ho hum!

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: That wasn’t a choir, that was a little musical aggravation.

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Pretty is as pretty does.

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Christmas Eve
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: The best way to spread Christmas cheer is singing loud for all to hear.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Buddy the Elf

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Christmas
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: It's a Christmas miracle (often uttered in non-holiday months).
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: Boxing Day
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Margot: You're going to need this. Elle: Your scrunchie? Margot: My LUCKY scrunchie. It helped me pass Spanish class. Serena: You passed Spanish because you gave Professor Montoya a lap dance after the final. Margot: Yeahhhhh, luckily!
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: The movie Legally Blonde

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: National Fruitcake Day
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: You know you are getting old when the candles cost more than the cake.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Bob Hope

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: He took over like Grant went through Richmond.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: There seams to be more girl than dress.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Papa

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: National Bacon Day (not to be confused with International Bacon Day)
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: Bippity boppity bacon!

ns1:PAGE.ns1:NAME: New Year's Eve
ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: A good time was had by all.
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Granny

ns1:PAGE.ns1:SAYING: This page has nothing to say
ns1:PAGE.ns1:AUTHOR: Alexa
